metadata.title: CVE-2024-38312 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: When browsing private tabs, some data related to location history orwebpage thumbnails could be persisted incorrectly within the sandboxed appbundle after app termination This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS <127.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
